Package jdr.generator.api.characters.illustration

Interface CharacterIllustrationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharacterIllustrationServiceImpl
public interface CharacterIllustrationService
Service interface for managing character illustration operations.

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • save

      CharacterIllustrationEntity save(CharacterIllustrationEntity entity)
      Saves a new character illustration.
      Parameters:
      entity - The CharacterIllustrationEntity to save.
      Returns:
      The saved CharacterIllustrationEntity.

    • saveAndFlush

      CharacterIllustrationEntity saveAndFlush(CharacterIllustrationEntity entity)

    • findById

      CharacterIllustrationEntity findById(long id)
      Finds a character illustration by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character illustration to find.
      Returns:
      The found CharacterIllustrationEntity.

    • findByCharacterDetailsId

      CharacterIllustrationEntity findByCharacterDetailsId(Long characterDetailsId)
      Finds a character illustration by its associated character details ID.
      Parameters:
      characterDetailsId - The ID of the CharacterDetailsEntity to search by.
      Returns:
      The found CharacterIllustrationEntity.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the illustration is not found for the given characterDetailsId.

    • updateIllustration

      CharacterIllustrationEntity updateIllustration(Long characterDetailsId, byte[] newImageBlob, String newImageLabel)
      Updates an existing character illustration with a new image blob and optionally a new label.
      Parameters:
      characterDetailsId - The ID of the character details associated with the illustration.
      newImageBlob - The new image data as a byte array.
      newImageLabel - An optional new label for the image. If null, the existing label is kept.
      Returns:
      The updated CharacterIllustrationEntity.
